title: Jump To Block
description: Allows an entity to jump to another random block.

search_width.title: Search Width
search_width.description: The width (in blocks, in range [2, 15]) of the search box, centered around the mob.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The height (in blocks, in range [2, 15]) of the search box, centered around the mob.

minimum_path_length.title: Minimum Path Length
minimum_path_length.description: The minimum length (in blocks) of the mobs path to a block, in order to consider jumping to it.

scale_factor.title: Scale Factor
scale_factor.description: The scale factor of the bounding box of the mob while it is jumping.

cooldown_range.title: Cooldown Range
cooldown_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (positive, in seconds) between each attempted jump.

forbidden_blocks.title: Forbidden Blocks
forbidden_blocks.description: Blocks that the mob can't jump to.

max_velocity.title: Maximum Velocity
max_velocity.description: The maximum velocity with which the mob can jump.

minimum_distance.title: Minimum Distance
minimum_distance.description: The minimum distance (in blocks) from the mob to a block, in order to consider jumping to it.

preferred_blocks.title: Preferred Blocks
preferred_blocks.description: Blocks that the mob prefers jumping to.

preferred_blocks_chance.title: Preferred Blocks Chance
preferred_blocks_chance.description: Chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) that the mob will jump to a preferred block, if in range. Only matters if preferred blocks are defined.
